entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 24 February 2023
